taskDescription:
Implement 5 differentiating features and 3-tier monetization model for PMP 2026 Study App with PayPal integration ($14.99/mo or $119.99/year).

5 New Features:
1. Exam Day Simulator - Real-time AI coaching during exams with behavioral analysis (pacing, flag patterns, anxiety detection)
2. Smart Study Roadmap - AI-generated personalized curriculum that adapts weekly based on exam date and progress
3. Concept Graph Explorer - Visual D3.js knowledge mapping showing relationships between PMP concepts
4. Micro-Learning Flashcards - 2-minute contextual sessions with PWA widget, audio support, and study queue
5. Adaptive Explanations - Multi-format explanations (Simple, Technical, Analogy, Visual) that adapt to user expertise

3-Tier Model:
- Public (Anonymous): 50 flashcards/day, 30 questions/day, 1 mini-exam (25Q)
- Free (Registered): Unlimited core studying, 2 mini-exams/month, limited new features
- Premium ($14.99/mo or $119.99/year): Full 185-Q exams, all 5 new features unlimited, mobile offline

Payment: PayPal Business Account integration with subscriptions

Tech Stack: Backend (Python FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, Alembic, PostgreSQL), Frontend (Next.js 14, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Zustand, SWR)

features.description: Phase 1: Tier System Infrastructure - Add tier field to users table (public/free/premium), create subscriptions table and usage_tracking table, generate Alembic migrations, update user schemas. Files: backend/app/models/user.py, backend/app/schemas/user.py, backend/alembic/versions/xxx_add_tier_system.py

Phase 2: PayPal Integration - Create PayPal service with order creation, capture, subscription management, and IPN webhook handler; add PayPal router with endpoints for checkout and webhooks. Files: backend/app/services/paypal_service.py (NEW), backend/app/routers/paypal.py (NEW), backend/app/models/subscription.py (NEW)

Phase 3: Tier Enforcement - Create tier_middleware and @tier_required/@limit_check decorators, implement usage_service for tracking daily/monthly limits, update flashcards/questions/exams routers with limits, create TierGate frontend component. Files: backend/app/middleware/tier_middleware.py (NEW), backend/app/services/usage_service.py (NEW), backend/app/routers/flashcards.py (MODIFY), backend/app/routers/questions.py (MODIFY), backend/app/routers/exams.py (MODIFY), frontend/src/components/TierGate.tsx (NEW)
features.lastError: Worker stuck after 12+ minutes with no output (only "initializing"). Needs retry.

Files: backend/app/models/roadmap.py (NEW), backend/app/services/roadmap_generator.py (NEW), backend/app/routers/roadmap.py (NEW), frontend/src/components/roadmap/StudyRoadmapView.tsx (NEW), frontend/src/components/roadmap/DailyStudyPlan.tsx (NEW), frontend/src/components/roadmap/RoadmapSetupWizard.tsx (NEW)

features.description: Phase 5b: Micro-Learning Flashcards - Create MicroFlashcard, StudyQueue, QuickSession models, build MicroLearningScheduler service, add micro card endpoints, create PWA MicroSessionWidget, QueueManager, and AudioFlashcardPlayer frontend components. Files: backend/app/models/micro_learning.py (NEW), backend/app/services/micro_scheduler.py (NEW), backend/app/routers/micro_cards.py (NEW), frontend/src/components/micro/MicroSessionWidget.tsx (NEW), frontend/src/components/micro/QueueManager.tsx (NEW), frontend/src/components/micro/AudioFlashcardPlayer.tsx (NEW)

Phase 6: Adaptive Explanations - Create ExplanationTemplate and ExplanationHistory models, extend User model with learning preferences, build AdaptiveExplanationEngine service, add explanation endpoints, create AdaptiveExplanationPanel and TeachBackMode frontend components. Files: backend/app/models/explanation.py (NEW), backend/app/services/adaptive_explanation.py (NEW), backend/app/routers/explanations.py (NEW), frontend/src/components/explanation/AdaptiveExplanationPanel.tsx (NEW), frontend/src/components/explanation/TeachBackMode.tsx (NEW)

Phase 7: Frontend Integration & Polish - Create pricing page with PayPal checkout and feature comparison, update userStore with tier state, add upgrade prompts when limits hit, update dashboard and navigation, add telemetry for feature usage by tier. Files: frontend/src/app/pricing/page.tsx (NEW), frontend/src/stores/userStore.ts (MODIFY), frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx (MODIFY), frontend/src/app/dashboard/page.tsx (MODIFY)
